title: The Handmaiden of Death: Book One of The Dark Angel Trilogy
description: Sixteen-year-old Amber Marsden must fight for survival after a botched drug deal leaves her orphaned on the frozen streets of Detroit. With nowhere to turn, she takes shelter among the ruins only to discover she's not alone in the dark... Set against the backdrop of a city in decline, The Handmaiden of Death is a fast-paced, darkly spellbinding foray into the human psyche that will captivate fans of the vampire genre seeking a story with a lot less 'sparkle' and a lot more bite.
author: Sarah Stafford
